/* Other Eastern Orthodox Churches under communist rule */
The Pope of Rome did not call, attend, or preside over any ecumenical council of the undivided Church. This is established historical fact.
The Patriarch of Constantinople presided over the 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, and 7th ecumenical councils. The Pope never called or presided over an ecumenical council of the undivided Church.

Not just the Roman rite, but the other rites of the Catholic Church also
/* Ground */ Renaming section head. "Ground" just doesn't sound right
/* Conversion of East and South Slavs */ Corrected inappropriate placement of term "Eastern Orthodoxy" in a historical context before the Orthodox church's existence.
/* Roman/Byzantine Empire */ Removed "Orthodox" from the Eastern Christian culture. "Eastern Orthodox" doesn't even EXIST until after 1054, which is 500 years after the Byzantine Empire's peak!
/* The Cross */ Wording of evidence, which is used in an inappropriate contex. Implying that evidence actually exists.
/* Monasticism */ Moved [[Image:megaloschema.svg|thumb|200px|left|The Schema worn by Eastern Orthodox Monks.]],to the left
/* Typica */ no significance of adding Ukrainian in this example, and it may cause confusion, as there is a non-canonical ukrainian church
